languages.text: Судя по следам на теле и вокруг, разведчику вспороли живот и заставили плясать, придерживая собственные внутренности.

traits.locale_text: Судя по следам на теле и вокруг, разведчику вспороли живот и заставили плясать, придерживая собственные внутренности.

languages.text: Judging by the tell-tale signs on and around the body, somebody gutted the scout and made him dance while trying to hold in his own entrails.
languages.original_text: Судя по следам на теле и вокруг, разведчику вспороли живот и заставили плясать, придерживая собственные внутренности.

traits.locale_text: Judging by telltale signs on the body and around it, somebody had gutted the scout and made him dance clutching his own viscera.
Judging by telltale signs on the body and around it, somebody had gutted the scout and made him dance clutching his own viscera.
Judging by the tell-tale signs on and around the body, somebody gutted the scout and made him dance while trying to hold in his own entrails.
Judging by the tell-tale signs on and around the body, somebody gutted the scout and made him dance while trying to hold in his own entrails.
Judging by the tell-tale signs on and around the body, somebody gutted the scout and made him dance while trying to hold in his own entrails.

languages.text: 从尸体的伤痕与周围的痕迹来看，有人剖开了这位侦察兵的肚子，还逼着他一边跳舞，一边捂着自己的内脏，不要让它们流出来。
languages.original_text: Judging by the tell-tale signs on and around the body, somebody gutted the scout and made him dance while trying to hold in his own entrails.

traits.locale_text: 从尸体的伤痕与周围的痕迹来看，有人剖开了这位侦察兵的肚子，还逼着他一边跳舞，一边捂着自己的内脏，不要让它们流出来。

languages.text: A juzgar por el estado del cadáver y su alrededor, alguien destripó al explorador y le hizo bailar mientras intentaba sujetar sus propias entrañas.
languages.original_text: Judging by the tell-tale signs on and around the body, somebody gutted the scout and made him dance while trying to hold in his own entrails.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por el estado del cadáver y su alrededor, alguien destripó al explorador y le hizo bailar mientras intentaba sujetar sus propias entrañas.

languages.text: 遺体とその周囲の明らかな形跡から判断すると、何者かが内臓を引きずり出そうとしてこの偵察者をゆさゆさ動かしたようだ。
languages.original_text: Judging by the tell-tale signs on and around the body, somebody gutted the scout and made him dance while trying to hold in his own entrails.

traits.locale_text: 遺体とその周囲の明らかな形跡から判断すると、何者かが内臓を引きずり出そうとしてこの偵察者をゆさゆさ動かしたようだ。

languages.text: À en croire les signes révélateurs sur le corps et tout autour, quelqu'un a éventré l'éclaireur avant de le forcer à danser en tenant ses entrailles à deux mains.
languages.original_text: Judging by the tell-tale signs on and around the body, somebody gutted the scout and made him dance while trying to hold in his own entrails.

traits.locale_text: À en croire les signes révélateurs sur le corps et tout autour, quelqu'un a éventré l'éclaireur avant de le forcer à danser en tenant ses entrailles à deux mains.

languages.text: Den Zeichen an der und rund um die Leiche zu schließen, hat jemand den Späher ausgeweidet und dann tanzen lassen, während er versuchte, seine eigenen Eingeweide im Körper zu halten.
languages.original_text: Judging by the tell-tale signs on and around the body, somebody gutted the scout and made him dance while trying to hold in his own entrails.

traits.locale_text: Den Zeichen an der und rund um die Leiche zu schließen, hat jemand den Späher ausgeweidet und dann tanzen lassen, während er versuchte, seine eigenen Eingeweide im Körper zu halten.

languages.text: Bedenin üzeri ve etrafındaki bariz işaretlere bakılırsa birisi, erin bağırsaklarını çıkarmış ve iç organlarını tutmaya çalışırken onu dans ettirmiş.
languages.original_text: Judging by the tell-tale signs on and around the body, somebody gutted the scout and made him dance while trying to hold in his own entrails.

traits.locale_text: Bedenin üzerindeki ve etrafındaki bariz işaretlere bakılırsa birisi, erin bağırsaklarını çıkarmış ve kendi iç organlarını tutmaya çalışırken onu dans ettirmiş.
